document_data.name: Kral
document_data.home: [[Phlan]], [[Moonsea]]{{Cite adventurers league/Dark Pyramid of Sorcerer's Isle|7}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Kral''' was a [[bard]] and [[Harpers]] agent in [[Phlan]] in [[1489 DR]].
document_data.Personality: The bard was little paranoid and preferred to be underestimated by his enemies. Despite this, he was a joking and personable individual.
document_data.History: In 1489 DR, after [[Vorgansharax]]'s coup, Kral helped the [[Lord Sage of Phlan]] to unveil the mysteries of [[Denlor's Tower]]. Publicly, he acted as the Lord's servant.
